summary.span: 代表幾何子區段，即二維幾何區段的一系列單一連線。

span.span: Represents a subsection of a geometry, a single connected series of two-dimensional geometric segments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A所組成的一或多個圖表，由類別。A is made up of one or more figures, represented by the class. 每一個圖形組成一或多個區段中，所定義本身是類別。Each figure is itself made up of one or more segments, defined by the class. ## XAML 物件項目用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` -or- oneOrMoreSegments ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `oneOrMoreSegments` 衍生自物件的一或多個物件項目。One or more object elements for objects that derive from . 一般而言，這些是： ，Typically these are: , , , , , , ., , , , , .

span.span: The computational tolerance of error.

param.name: type
param.span: 指定容許誤差的解譯方式。

span.span: Specifies how the error of tolerance is interpreted.

summary.span: 在指定的容許誤差內取得 物件，這是這個 物件的多邊形近似值。

span.span: Gets a object, within the specified error of tolerance, that is an polygonal approximation of this object.

returns.span: 這個 物件的多邊形近似值。

span.span: The polygonal approximation of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簡維的程序是相對於動畫和曲線線段參數失真。The flattening process is lossy with respect to animation and curve segment parameters. `tolerance` 決定曲線的計算值的程度。`tolerance` determines how closely the curve is approximated.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsFilled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定是否使用這個 所含區域進行點擊測試 (Hit-Test)、轉譯和裁剪。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the contained area of this is to be used for hit-testing, rendering, and clipping.

value.span: 決定是否要使用這個 所含區域進行點擊測試 (Hit-Test)、轉譯和裁剪。

span.span: Determines whether the contained area of this is to be used for hit-testing, rendering, and clipping.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`false`，則只有外框的將會使用與整體的區域不會構成其所包含的區域將。If this property is set to `false`, then only the outline of the will be used, and its contained area will not contribute to the overall area of the . 一個使用這個屬性是在其他允許遭拒的筆劃填滿，喜歡在下方的左邊笑臉說話。One use of this property is to allow unfilled strokes in an otherwise filled , like the mouth in the left Smiley below. 設定說話至`true`可能會產生不想要在右邊的臉說話的效果。Setting the mouth's to `true` may produce the undesired effect of the mouth in the right Smiley. ![已填入笑臉的路徑](~/add/media/ref-mil-pathfigure-isfilled-smiley.PNG "已填入笑臉的路徑")![smiley path is filled](~/add/media/ref-mil-pathfigure-isfilled-smiley.PNG "smiley path is filled") IsFilled 範例IsFilled Example ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會產生一系列的移動，並繪製命令。這些命令的格式的相關資訊，請參閱[路徑標記語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/path-markup-syntax.md)概觀。This method produces a series of move and draw commands; for more information about the format of these commands, see the [Path Markup Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/path-markup-syntax.md) overview.
